roleset.name: pique one's interest
roleset.note: INTRIGUE-V NOTES: Frame created by Arrick (from intrigue.01-v)
INTRIGUED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from intrigued.01-j)

example.name: no instrument
example.text: The handwriting of typographers intrigues me because it raises so many questions, big and small...
example.arg: because it raises so many questions, big and small

example.name: adjective
example.text: Another intriguing artifact is a jade tablet engraved * with a scene depicting a group of Shu people dressed * in short skirts adn holding jade tablets as they kneel in worship to the mountain god.
